Package de.eckhartarnold.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AttachmentListener
    Listener for the "attachment" events onLoad, onUnload.
    Filmstrip.IPickImage
    An interface that encapsulates a callback method which is called when the user clicks on an image of the film strip.
    GalleryListener
    The Listener interfaces for events of the Gallery object.
    I18NConstants
    Class I18NConstants and defines some string constants for the user interface that ought to be language dependent.
    ImageCollectionInfo
    The interface ImageCollectionInfo is for querying the configuration data of the photo album.
    ImageCollectionReader.ICallback
    This interface defines a call back function that is called with the ImageCollectionReader object as parameter.
    ImageCollectionReader.IMessage
    This interface defines a call back that receives a string message.
    ImagePanel.DisplayListener
    Interface for event listeners of ImagePanel.
    PickImageHandler
    Handler for pick image events that are emitted by gallery objects.
    ResizeListener
    Interface to be implemented by widgets that will be informed if their parent widget has been resized.
    SlideshowControl
    A control for the slide show.
    SlideshowListener
    Interface for event listeners of class Slideshow.
    SourcesAttachmentEvents
    Indicates that a widget allows adding attachment listeners.
    StartSlideshowHandler
    Handler for the start slideshow event that is emitted by gallery objects
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Caption
    Displays the image caption of the currently displayed slide of a Slideshow.
    CaptionOverlay
    Encapsulates a caption in a transparent pop-up window over the image panel.
    Compatibility
    Compatibility layer to evade a bug or feature (?)
    ControlPanel
    A control panel for the slide show.
    ControlPanelOverlay
    Puts a ControlPanel that also contains filmstrip widget in a pop-up window.
    Debugger
    A very simple "printf"-type debugger.
    ExtendedHtmlSanitizer  
    Fade
    Provides a special kind of animation that lets a widget fade in or fade out.
    Filmstrip
    Displays a row of thumbnail images as if on a film strip.
    FullScreenLayout
    Implements a "full screen" layout for the slide show.
    Gallery
    Implements the full gallery widget.
    GalleryBase  
    GalleryPresentation
    Ties together the gallery and the slide show.
    GalleryWidget
    presents the user with a table of thumbnail images that can be clicked by the user.
    GWTPhotoAlbum
    Main class of GWTPhotoAlbum and entry point for the online photo album.
    HTMLLayout
    Class HTMLLayout allows to code the layout of the image panel, control panel and caption in HTML.
    I18N
    Contains an instance of class I18NConstans with the translations of all string constants that GWTPhotoAlbum uses.
    ImageCollectionReader
    Reads the information about the image collection from a number of .json files.
    ImageCollectionReader.MessageDialog
    This is a helper class that allows displaying an error message in a dialog so that the user can be notified of any error that occurred during reading the configuration data from the .json files.
    ImagePanel
    Displays a photo on an absolute panel.
    Layout
    Abstract base class for all layout classes for the slide show.
    PanelOverlayBase
    Abstract base class for the control panel overlay classes.
    Presentation
    Common root of the presentation classes.
    ProgressBar
    A progress bar widget.
    Rectangle
    Simple class that stores the x,y,w,h coordinates of a rectangle.
    Slideshow
    Plays a slide show on an ImagePanel.
    SlideshowPresentation
    A simpler version of class GalleryPresentation which only "presents" the slide show an omits the gallery page.
    StatusTag
    This class gives access to the status tag of the main html page.
    Thumbnails
    Administers a collection of thumbnail images.
    TiledLayout
    Defines a "tiled" layout.
    Toolbox
    Some tool box functions used at several places in the code.
    Tooltip
    A "tool tip" widget.
    TouchControls
    Simple touch screen controls for the image panel.
